content: Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command google returned: ["https://www.forbes.com/sites/laurabegleybloom/2019/09/04/bucket-list-travel-the-top-50-places-in-the-world/", "https://www.boredpanda.com/amazing-places-to-see-before-you-die-2/", "https://travel.usnews.com/rankings/best-usa-vacations/", "https://www.planetware.com/world/top-places-to-visit-in-the-world-us-az-234.htm", "https://travel.usnews.com/rankings/worlds-best-vacations/", "https://www.atlasobscura.com/", "https://www.harpersbazaar.com/culture/travel-dining/g7171/most-beautiful-places-in-the-world/", "https://www.busytourist.com/best-vacation-spots-and-places-to-visit/"]
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text provides a list of 50 interesting places to visit around the world, including cities, beaches, and natural wonders. Bali tops the list, followed by New Orleans, Kerry in Ireland, Marrakesh in Morocco, and Sydney. The study found that people were more likely to add a destination to their list if they had seen it on social media, and 33% of people research vacation destinations on their Instagram feed. The text also includes brief descriptions of each destination and what makes it unique, such as Paris, Tokyo, Fiji, Machu Picchu, Ibiza, and the Matterhorn. 
 
 Links: [' Privacy Statement (https://www.forbes.com/privacy/english/#6b72571a3061)', 'Subscribe to newsletters (https://account.forbes.com?utm_source=header&utm_medium=newsletter)', ' (https://www.forbes.com/)', 'Subscribe  (https://account.forbes.com/subscribe?eventSource=header&redirect=https://www.forbes.com/sites/laurabegleybloom/2019/09/04/bucket-list-travel-the-top-50-places-in-the-world/)', ' (https://www.forbes.com/sites/micheleherrmann/2023/05/18/ole--steens-new-york-baker-is-making-his-mark-at-manhattan-locations/)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : The article discusses the top 50 bucket list travel destinations in the world, as determined by a survey of Big 7 Travel's social media audience. Bali topped the list, followed by New Orleans, Kerry in Ireland, Marrakesh in Morocco, and Sydney. The destinations include cities, beaches, and natural landscapes, with 22% having white sandy beaches and 52% being iconic cities. The author provides brief descriptions of each destination, highlighting their unique features and attractions. The study found that people were more likely to add a destination to their bucket list if they had seen it on social media, and 33% of people research vacation destinations on their Instagram feed.

The destinations include cities, beaches, and natural landscapes, with 22% having white sandy beaches and 52% being iconic cities.
